list.name: Changes
list.comment:
feat(landing): simplify product catalog layout and unify variant display
- Replaced separate desktop table and mobile stacked views with a unified, responsive grid design for product variants. - Adjusted layout to improve alignment and consistency across devices. - Updated product item structure to ensure better accessibility and maintainability.

component.name: DjangoConsoleOptions

option.name: myCustomStartScript

task.summary:
chore: update project configuration files to use Python 3.12 SDK
- Updated `.idea` files to reference Python 3.12 instead of Python 3.9. - Adjusted workspace settings and added new configuration components.
chore: bump Django version to 5.2.5 in requirements.txt

chore: update `.gitignore` and `.idea` configurations
- Added `.idea/` to `.gitignore` to exclude PyCharm project files. - Updated `.idea/workspace.xml` with adjustments for configurations and workspace settings.

feat(landing): add CLP currency filter and improve product catalog rendering
- Introduced a new template tag `clp` to format numbers as Chilean Pesos with thousands separators. - Enhanced `catalog.html` to use the `clp` filter for displaying product and variant prices. - Improved accessibility and performance by adding `loading="lazy"` to product images. - Refactored catalog layout for better responsive support and detailed variant display: - Added desktop table and mobile stacked views for product variants. - Displayed stock and bulk pricing where applicable. - Updated product search functionality to include variant data filtering. - Streamlined `dashboard/fixtures/products.json` to include additional placeholders and clean up data.

feat(products): add product export HTML templates
- Added `products.htm` and related folder containing `filelist.xml`, `sheet001.htm`, and other supporting files. - Templates support displaying product data, pricing, and availability in a structured HTML format. - Includes JavaScript for interactive frameset and tab navigation to enhance user experience.

feat(landing): simplify product catalog layout and unify variant display
- Replaced separate desktop table and mobile stacked views with a unified, responsive grid design for product variants. - Adjusted layout to improve alignment and consistency across devices. - Updated product item structure to ensure better accessibility and maintainability.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value:
